body:
We hope to complete xsdk@0.7.0 in a week or so

Some of the changes were reviewed at https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/26725

cc: @ulrikeyang

Previously  this PR included the following changes - that are now split up (so they can be independently reviewed/merged)
- https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27267
- https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27303
- https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27296
- https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27295
title: xsdk: add  version @0.7.0
